attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: The app is terrible the president is terrible this whole thing is a joke and it takes weeks to download for such a rich guy he should be better at making software he doesn’t deserve another 4 years. Free the kids in cages.

attributes.title: ew❤️
attributes.review:
this app is absolutely terrible i tell you. i have perfect Wi-Fi so it shouldn’t be a problem to do anything on my phone, although this app took about 5 hours to download! i just wanted to text our president that has admitted to being a pedo- . worst app ever apple!!! 

oh and blm😏❤️

attributes.title: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE
attributes.review: If i could give it no stars I would. First off saying this app took 5 hours to download😐😐 and when I opened then app I had a heart attack. The picture of this guy scared me😭😭 the only reason you should download this app is if you want to have a heart attack😭💀

attributes.title: Don’t do this to all tiktok users
attributes.review: Please don’t ban tiktok people use that app the pay rent it’s there JOB and your going to do that to us THIS IS WHY 2020 is like this because of you! You are the worst person I know  TIKTOK is #1 on this app! And you make so much money from are videos we make! Good bye roach

attributes.title: trump is terrible
attributes.review: this app took FOREVER to download and i have perfectly good wifi at my house, when i tried to open it my phone CRASHED and it wouldn’t turn on again so i had to go to the store and try to fix my phone but it was UNFIXABLE!!! This app cost me $1,000 DO NOT DOWNLOAD 😡😡🤬

attributes.title: Racist, Fascist, Authoritarian, Rapist
attributes.review: Donald Trump once went up to me and said that my tabby cat is too fat for survival then pushed it off the bridge. That thing he thought was a cat was my grandmother Franny who was a ginger and got plastic surgery when she was younger. She got made fun of in college for her plastic surgery. I just can’t believe that was how she died.

attributes.title: Worst app I have ever owned🙃
attributes.review: This app is terrible!! I open the app only to find that a cheeto is staring at the screen. I am alergic to cheetos!!!! I almost died just by having the app. Then the app started spitting at me through the screen and tried to seduce me. It was disgusting! Never, and I mean NEVER download this app. ITS FOR YOUR OWN SAFETY!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever :
attributes.review: This app not only is racist but is very degrading to the community itself . This is needs to get taken down because people want a good future for their kids (and also their grandkids) , and this will get in the way of their future . Thank you .

attributes.title: Donald Trump is a baby
attributes.review: When I see him listen to someone he disagrees with and let’s them finish one sentence without interrupting just to insult them then I will care what people who like him have to say. Until then anyone who supports him I also see as a big baby.

attributes.title: Not as good as it sounds :(
attributes.review: I was hoping on this app I would find out how great MY president is! But instead the app keeps crashing and some orange dude keeps popping up! And I Lowkey think this app is made by a troller... like all I wanted is to find out about my president and this is what I get?! Unacceptable!
